code: const API="/api/todos";export const fetchTodos=()=>fetch(API).then(res=>res.json());export const createTodo=title=>fetch(API,{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({title,completed:false})}).then(res=>res.json());export const updateTodo=todo=>fetch("".concat(API,"/").concat(todo.id),{method:"PUT",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(todo)}).then(res=>res.json());export const deleteTodo=id=>fetch("".concat(API,"/").concat(id),{method:"DELETE"});
